import React from 'react'; import './css/addProduct.css'; import { useEffect,useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; import 'sweetalert2/dist/sweetalert2.css'; const AddProudect = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [size, setSize] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(""); const[color, setColor] = useState(""); const[image, setImage] = useState(""); const[cat_id, setcat_id] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { }, []); const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default behavior of the event const token = localStorage.getItem("token") || ""; const data = { name: name, description: description, price: price, color:color, size: size, cat_id: cat_id, image: image, }; try { const response = await axios.post("http://localhost:8000/addProduct", data); // Display success message Swal.fire({ icon: 'success', title: 'Success!', text: 'Product has been submitted successfully.', }); console.log(response.data); } catch (error) { // Display error message Swal.fire({ icon: 'error', title: 'Error!', text: 'Failed to submit the product.', }); console.error(error.message); } }; return (
